mapper.select: select ss.id, ss.assignment_id as assignmentId, ss.user_id as userId, ss.score, ss.status, a.created_at as createdAt, a.updated_at as updatedAt from student_score ss inner join assignment a on a.id = ss.assignment_id where a.section_id =#{sectionId};

select ss.id, ss.assignment_id as assignmentId, ss.user_id as userId, ss.score, ss.status, a.created_at as createdAt, a.updated_at as updatedAt from student_score ss inner join assignment a on a.id = ss.assignment_id where a.section_id =#{sectionId};
select ci.status = 0 from student_answer a inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id ::uuid where a.id =#{id}::uuid;
mapper.update: update student_score set assignment_id = #{assignmentId}, user_id = #{userId}, score = #{score}, status = #{status} where id=#{id}::uuid;
mapper.insert: insert into student_score (assignment_id, user_id, score, status) values (#{assignmentId}, #{userId}, #{score}, #{status});
